Package fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.statement

Interface Summary
Condition An interface for test statements.
Effect An interface for effect statements.
Statement<T> An interface for all the statements.
 

Class Summary
BelongingFunctor A class to add the "has(...)" and "takes(...)" methods to the Jexl Engine.
CompoundOperatorAssignmentEffect A class to handle compound operators assignment.
DefaultCondition A class representing a boolean statement.
DefaultEffect The Class DefaultEffect.
IdBasedU3duJexlContext An abstract class for id-based U3DU Jexl contexts.
LocationFunctor A class for location functions in Jexl.
MemoryAwareU3duJexlContext A Jexl context accepting the "id_" syntax.
ServiceAwareU3duJexlContext A service-aware implementation of JexlContext for expressions evaluation.
ServiceAwareU3duJexlEngine An enhanced JexlEngine with functions: owner:has('modelName') and owner:has('modelName', 'expressionToBeVerifiedByThe$InstanceOfTheModel'); receiver:takes('modelName') and receiver:takes('modelName', 'expressionToBeVerifiedByThe$InstanceOfTheModel'); eval:string('myStringToBeEvaluated').
StatementFactory A factory for creating Statement objects.
StatementsGroup This class contains two kinds of statements: conditions, to check the preconditions of the execution; effects, to be executed.
StringEvaluationFunctor A class to add the "eval:string('myExpression')" method to the Jexl engine.
U3duExpression<T> A class for expressions and their evaluation.
U3duJexlContext A common class to build U3du-specific JexlContext.
WorldAwareU3duJexlContext A Jexl context accepting the "id_" syntax.
 

Enum Summary
ExecutionMode An enumeration describing the two possible ways of executing services.
 

Exception Summary
MalformedExpressionVariableException A class for problems with variable names in Jexl Contexts.
